sc.server.network

Class ClientManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.server.network.ClientManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, IClientListener

    public class ClientManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, IClientListener
    The ClientManager serves as a lookup table for all active connections.

        public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the ClientManager in it's own daemon thread. This method should be used only once. clientListener starts SocketListener on defined port to watch for new connecting clients
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
